attributes.action: To make big business  recycle more for the environment
attributes.background: big business are responsible for more trash that come out. if they recycled more there would be less of a issue with landfills and pollution.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
